persona.name: Georg
persona.activities: Georg is a family father who lives with his family. He lives a routine life. Every morning he uses his mobile devices for reading news and for managing his Facebook account while having breakfast. Thereafter, he goes to work by car. He has a daytime job with regular working ours. He always has his personal mobile Internet device with him.
persona.attitudes: He uses his mobile internet device (MID) as authentication token. He likes single-sign-on. He only authenticates to his MID and uses other devices which inherit his authentication towards the MID when being used.
